import React, { useRef } from "react"; import emailjs, { send } from "@emailjs/browser"; import "./Contact.css"; import { ToastContainer, toast } from "react-toastify"; import "react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css"; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); //alert msg const sentEmailAlert = () => { toast.success("Registration success", { position: "top-center", }); }; const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_1y3xwfi", "template_asy4jli", form.current, "iWHB0mgmHjb6kGvJI" ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text); console.log("message sent successfully"); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); } ); }; return ( <>
